document.masterDocTitle: Pamphagidae (Orthoptera: Acridoidea) from the Palaearctic Region: taxonomy, classification, keys to genera and a review of the tribe Nocarodeini I. Bolívar

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality. Georgia: Transcaucasia,
Tbilisi .
Holotype :
female (Unspecified host).

Distribution.
Georgia
: Tbilisi ,
Azerbaijan
: Dash-Burun, Margushevan ( Fig. 847 ).

Remarks. All specimens considered as
N. serricollis
in the ZIN belong actually to this species. Therefore Stolyarov (1984: 20) synonymized
Nocarodes transcaucasicus Ramme, 1951
with
N. serricollis
, but it is a synonym of
N. sanctidavidi
indeed. This species is easily distinguished from
N. serricollis
by the key characters.
